dcterms:description: The OTFS dataset is utilized to investigate the performance of orthogonal time frequency space modulation in enabling ultra-reliable low-latency communications (URLLC).
dcterms:title: OTFS (Orthogonal Time Frequency Space)

dcterms:creator: Z. Wei
W. Yuan
S. Li
J. Yuan
G. Bharatula
R. Hadani
L. Hanzo
dcterms:description: This dataset is referenced for analyzing the performance of OTFS modulation as a promising next-generation waveform for URLLC.
dcterms:title: OTFS (Orthogonal Time Frequency Space)

dcterms:creator: P. Raviteja
Y. Hong
E. Viterbo
E. Biglieri
dcterms:description: The dataset is used to study the effective diversity of OTFS modulation, which is crucial for achieving high reliability in URLLC.
dcterms:title: OTFS (Orthogonal Time Frequency Space)

dcterms:creator: S. Li
J. Yuan
Z. Wei
B. Bai
D. W. K. Ng
dcterms:description: This dataset is referenced for performance analysis of coded OTFS systems over high-mobility channels, which is essential for URLLC applications.
dcterms:title: OTFS (Orthogonal Time Frequency Space)

dcterms:creator: P. Raviteja
K. T. Phan
Y. Hong
E. Viterbo
dcterms:description: The dataset is used for studying interference cancellation and iterative detection methods for OTFS modulation, which are important for enhancing communication reliability.
dcterms:title: OTFS (Orthogonal Time Frequency Space)

dcterms:creator: S. Li
W. Yuan
Z. Wei
J. Yuan
dcterms:description: This dataset is referenced for cross-domain iterative detection methods for OTFS modulation, which are crucial for improving detection performance in URLLC.
dcterms:title: OTFS (Orthogonal Time Frequency Space)

dcterms:creator: W. Shen
L. Dai
J. An
P. Fan
R. W. Heath
dcterms:description: The dataset is used for channel estimation in OTFS massive MIMO systems, which is essential for reliable communication in URLLC.
dcterms:title: OTFS (Orthogonal Time Frequency Space)

dcterms:creator: P. Raviteja
K. T. Phan
Y. Hong
dcterms:description: This dataset is referenced for embedded pilot-aided channel estimation for OTFS in delay-Doppler channels, which is important for enhancing communication reliability.
dcterms:title: OTFS (Orthogonal Time Frequency Space)
